original_title: Crossfire: The Plot that Killed Kennedy
overview: Jim Marrs' best selling book comes to Film taking you deep into the conspiracy of John F. Kennedy's untimely death with visual and factual information that rules out the lone assassination theory. Jim Marrs takes you through the most important historical event of the 20th century - the assassination of a United States President.
title: Crossfire: The Plot that Killed Kennedy
